mapper.sql: SELECT v.violation_id AS id, v.plate_number AS plate, v.violation_time AS time, tr.violation_type AS type, d.address AS location, -- [修正] 'location' 字段现在从 devices 表的 'address' 获取 dist.district_name AS district, -- [修正] 'district' 字段现在从 districts 表获取 d.device_name AS device, v.status AS status FROM violations v -- [修正] 通过 violations.device_id 连接到 devices 表 LEFT JOIN devices d ON v.device_id = d.device_id -- [修正] 再通过 devices.district_id 连接到 districts 表, 以获取辖区名称 LEFT JOIN districts dist ON d.district_id = dist.district_id -- [保留] 对 traffic_rules 表的连接保持不变 LEFT JOIN traffic_rules tr ON v.rule_id = tr.rule_id
mapper.select: ORDER BY v.violation_time DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(v.violation_id) FROM violations v -- [修正] 为了满足筛选条件, 只需要连接 traffic_rules 即可, 无需连接其他表, 提升count效率 LEFT JOIN traffic_rules tr ON v.rule_id = tr.rule_id
